title: Offer Seat Upgrade to Loyalty Member
description: A long-time season ticket holder and high-ranking loyalty member is offered a complimentary seat upgrade for a game.

tasks.description: Identify top-tier loyalty members attending the next game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of eligible fans.

tasks.description: Check for unsold premium seats for that game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds two available seats in a premium section.

tasks.description: Send a notification to an eligible fan offering them the complimentary upgrade.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the offer via the team's mobile app.

tasks.description: If the fan accepts, automatically reissue their tickets with the new seat location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fan accepts, and the agent's tool automatically updates their tickets.
